title: Italy : largest rivers in 2018 , by length
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Lenght in kilometers for 10 number of Rivers In Italys.
The Lenght in kilometers is highest at Rivers In Italy Po and lowest at Rivers In Italy Reno.
The difference of Lenght in kilometers between the highest and lowest Rivers In Italy is 441.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Lenght in kilometers for 10 number of Rivers In Italys.
Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers and Reno has the lowest Lenght in kilometers.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Rivers In Italy, and Lenght in kilometers in each Rivers In Italy on the y axis.
The Lenght in kilometers is appeared to be the highest at Rivers In Italy Po and lowest at Rivers In Italy Reno.
The maximum Rivers In Italy Po has got 3.09 times higher Lenght in kilometers than the minimum Rivers In Italy Reno.
Rivers In Italy Po is higher than any other Rivers In Italys with value 652.0, followed by , and Tevere. Down to Rivers In Italy Reno with the lowest value 211.0.
The Rivers In Italy Reno has 2.0 times less Lenght in kilometers than average.
The Lenght in kilometers is 3256.0 if we add up values of all Rivers In Italys.
